name: ComboSplitter
desc_en:
# ComboSplitter - For Beat Saber v1.38.0+
A small Beat Saber tool that modifies the combo panel to count a combo for each hand.

## Dependencies
* BSIPA v4.3.5+
* SiraUtil v3.1.12+
* BeatSaberMarkupLanguage v1.12.3+

## Usage
* Counts each individual hand's combo instead of a total combo for both
  * One saber maps will only show the active saber combo
* Option to follow the saber color scheme
  * *Can be disabled*
* Hover hint that shows hand stats when you hover over the combo text in the results screen.
  * Options:
    - Follow saber color scheme
    - Show percentage per hand
    - Show total misses
    - Extend miss info (shows misses, bomb hits, and bad cuts separately)
  * *All can be disabled*
* Bad cuts and misses are properly tracked for each hand
* Sticking your head inside a wall resets both combos down to zero
* Works in standard levels as well as multiplayer!
